div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio huius burgi xxiijo die mensis Junij Anno supradicto

Quo die cristinus de Kynnore in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Dauid de lichton' et emendabit
parti lese ad visum proborum virorum plegio

Dauid lichton' in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti clat et emendabit parti lese
ad visum proborum virorum plegio

Robertus de clat in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Dauid et emendabit parti lese
ad visum proborum virorum plegio

Dictus Dauid lichton' in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis de Kynnore et emendabit
parti lese et cetera plegio

Ricardus Kintor in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Dauid et emendabit parti lese ad
visum proborum virorum plegio

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio per balliuos huius burgi xxvjjjmo die mensis Junij Anno
Domini et cetera xlv / Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes

Thomas branche ex vna et Johannes mernoke partibus ex altera super debata inter eosdem submiserunt
se Johanni gray et Johanni patonson' et duobus alijs personis per eosdem arbitros eligendis
qui Jurabunt fideliter ad decisionem dicte cause et prefate partes stabunt eorum determinacioni
et ad hoc fideliter obligantur / Et si predicti arbitri nesciant dictam causam determinare vel
noluerint ad decisionem eiusdem Jurare / venient iterum ad decisionem huius curie / et dictus
Johannes gray erit plegius pro dicto Johanne mernoke prout antea fuit / quod comparebit responsurus
Cristiana sperk tercio die vocata ad sectam Roberti prat non comparuit quare precipitur seriendo et cetera
Johannes banerman secundo die vocatus ad sectam thome gibson' non comparuit quare precipitur seriendo et cetera

Andreas Johnson' in amerciamento curie pro eo quod non comparuit ad prosequendum plegium quod extendit super Jacobum
blyndeseil et

Andreas andreas alaneson in amerciamento curie pro eo quod non comparuit ad prosequendum plegium quod
extendit super Robertum camera et ipse quitus a calumpnia sua quousque de nouo citetur

Johannes Wood ex vna et Johannes sanchar partibus ex altera penes debatam motam inter eosdem pro tribus
barellis de hamburgh' salmonibus salsis / submiserunt se quatuor personis qui fuerunt in eodem
vigia viagio et duobus alijs personis per partes predictas eligendis et stabunt eorundem
determinacionibus et decreto / et dictus Johannes de sanchar satisfaciet prefato Johanni Wood infra
xl dies / tantum quantum adiudicatum fuerit per arbitros supradictos
Johannes croudane secundo die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi lammynton' non comparuit quare et cetera
Alexander de scrogs et consocij sui balliui secundo die vocatj ad sectam thome blyndseil non comparuerunt et cetera

Andreas meignes in amerciamento curie pro eo quod iniuste extendit plegium super Willelmum bird pro x vlnis
panni ab albi lanej et ipse quitus a calumpnia sua

Johannes adamson' obligatur fide media ad comparendum hodie ad quindenam tanquam in termino peremptorio
ad instanciam Ricardi Kintor responsurus et Juri periturus et cetera
Alexander crine secundo die vocatus ad sectam findelai fleschowar non comparuit quare precipitur et cetera
Robertus de camera primo die vocatus ad sectam Andree Duncaneson' non comparuit et cetera pro xxix s' vj d'
Johannes fleschar' et findelaius fleschar' in amerciamento curie pro eo non comparuerunt
Willelmus lammynton' et hugo fleschar' in amerciamentis curie pro infrictione statutj

Dominus Willelmus de forbes de Kynnaldy miles constituit procuratores suos gilbertum meignes
Johannem de marr' et Ricardum Kintor / in causa sua penes vnam botam de malvaseto et cetera
Item Johannes baxstar' Andreas bell' Johannes patrikson' Robertus Ranyson'
Gib tod secundo die vocatus ad intrandum Johannem Alaneson' ad sectam thome cadiou non comparuit et cetera

Quinto die mensis Julij Anno Dominj et cetera xlvto Johannes de spens seriendus obligatur
vmfredo de lask ad satisfaciendum vmfredo de lask iij lib' xiij s' iiij d' pro quibus
deuenit plegius alias eidem vmfredo pro alexandro meignes / infra xxviij da dies
proximo futuro / quod si deficiat intrabit in pretorio huius burgi et Remanebit
absque dolo et fraude antequam ex quousque satisfecerit dictam summam et cetera

Nono die mensis Julij Anno supradicto penes xix s' vj d' quos alexander Walkar mylnar' lucratus
fuit alias super Johannes Walkar' et quos assignauit gilberto de Spens coram balliuis huius
burgi / ipse alexander comparens personaliter quietum clamauit dictum alex Johannem de dicta
summa / Et preterea dedit thomam Walkar' et patrem eiusdem Johannem Johannis et henricum
Walkar' fratrem suum plegios quod balliui erunt indempnes de dicto gilberto spens de
dicta summa

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xijmo die mensis Julij
Anno Domini millesimo CCCC xlmo quinto / Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata
Johannes banerman tercio die vocatus ad sectam thome gibson' non comparuit quare precipitur seriendo et cetera
Alexander crine tercio die vocatus ad sectam findelai fleschowar' non comparuit quare precipitur et cetera
Johannes de croudane tercio die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi lammynton non comparuit quare precipitur et cetera

Andreas Duncaneson' in amerciamento curie pro eo quod non comparuit ad prosequendum plegium quod extendit super
Robertum de camera et ipse quitus a calumpnia sua quousque de nouo citetur

qDauid Ruthirfurd' pRicardus stephani et ceteri consocij suum primo die vocati ad sectam domini
Willelmi de forbes et gilbertj meignes pro tribus botis de malvaseto non comparuerunt quare
precipitur seriendo quod capiat districtum et cetera / Et sunt consocij qDauid blabre Johannes blak
cristinus de Kynnore Johannes adamson' Johannes andirson' qalexander lyndesay qthomas croudane
qWillelmus louson' qJohannes Sanchar qThis letter may have been deleted.Johannes Irwyne et qRobertus prat

Et predicti dominus Willelmus forbes et gilbertus meignes protestati fuerunt pro expensis suis factis
et faciendis
Alexander scrogs et socij suj balliui tercio die vocatj ad sectam thome blyndseil non comparuerunt

Actio inter Ricardum Kintor et Johannem Kynnore ex vna et Johannem adameson' partibus ex altera ponitur
in dilacione usque diem veneris proximo futuro / et tunc finietur per assisam proborum virorum

Johannes gray et Johannes paton' arbitri inter thomam branche ex vna pro se et sorore sua ex
vna et Johannes mernoke partibus ex altera electi vt supra / eligerunt sibi Johannem de scrogs
patrem Johannem Wood et Johannem henrison' culane / qui omnes Jurati determinarierunt et
pronunciarunt per os A Johannis de scrogs predicti partibus fideliter obligatis ad standum
eorundem determinacioni / quod vterque videlicet dictus thomas branche erit quitus de calumpnia
dicti Johannis mernoke / et idem Johannes erit quitus de calumpnia prefati thome et sororis
eius imperpetuum / de omnibus actionibus et calumpnijs motis inter eosdem tempore preterito
EtThere is a manicula in the left margin, with a finger pointing to 'Et'. super hoc dictus Johannes mernoke pecijt instrumentrum testibus Johanne vaus tunc preposito
Johanne Kymmedy et J thoma blyndseil cum alijs
Thomas gilruth' primo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis de buchane pro xiiij s' non comparuit quare et cetera

Cristiane sperk in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius an anuli aurei / et xj vlnarum
panni lanei a Roberto prat et satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris / except'
valore vnius capucij brunj / appreciandum per duos mercatores et vnum artificem
et appreciatus fuit pro xiij s' iiij d'

div.head: Assisa
div.p:
Gilbertus meignes Johannes gray Johannes Kintor Ricardus Kintor Johannes henrison' culane
Johannes patrikson' Willelmus cadiou Johannes stane Johannes Kynnore henricus sclatar'
et Johannes mawmond' / Qui Juratj dicunt quod quondam thomas lawson'

Die veneris xvj die mensis Julij Anno Dominj et cetera xlvto actio inter Ricardum Kintor et Johannem
Kynnore ex vna / et Johannem adamson' partibus ex altera continuata fuit in eodem statu
in quo fuit usque proximam curiam legalem absque preiudicio / Et dictus Johannes adameson'
con casu quo contingat ipsum illo die non esse presentem constituit Johannem scrogs suum
procuratorem et cetera et hoc consensu parcium

xvijmo die mensis supradicti Johannes michelson' Ja Juratus et examinatus coram preposito et balliuis
huius burgi / fideliter deposuit / quod ipse presens fuit vidit et audiuit quondam mercatores
qui fuerunt apud scaw vnico consensu dederunt Johanni adamson' omnimodam potestatem
suam ad prosequendum ly Wad quod fuit in bargia Comitis orcadie et ad emendum
et Redimendum dictum wad a Rege norwagie et suis intromissoribus / pro quo labore
sposon
sposponderunt spoponderunt sibi xl lib' monete Scocie vna cum expensis datis pro redempcione
dictj Wadd

Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio de Abirdene xxjo die mensis
Julij Anno et cetera xlv quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata

Alexander of strathachin in amerciment of the cwrt for the
wrangwiss' distrubelyn' of Rob of clat
Robertus de clat he is quyt of distrubelance of Alexander forsa

Alexander of strathachin in amerciment for bustwiss' spekyn to tom
blindzell the ballye in his office doyng and the assis hes
giffwyn in bidding to the said Alexander that in tym to cum that be
nothir barganour na twlyour h bot at his powar' to let sic
thing to be done

that ilk day John Wormot in amerciment for the wrangwiss'
distrubelyn of Dawy Don' and aw til amend hym as law will'

Item that ilke Dawy Dwn in amerciment of the cwrt for the wrangwiss'
distrubelyn of John' Wormot and aw til amend hym as law will'

Item John Wormot in amerciment of the cwrt for the brekkyn
of borowis of apon Dawy Dwn' and aw til amend it as law will'

Item Dawy Dwn' in amerciment of the cwrt for the brekkyn of
borowis' apon' John' Wormot and aw til amend it as
law will'

Item anent the brekkyn' of borowis betwen' John Wormot on'
the ta part And Dawy Dwn' on the tothir part the aldirman
and the balliez has takkyn Robart Wormot borch for the
said John' Wormot that he and his guddis sal entir on viij
dayis warning bath his body and his gud befor the king
and his consall' or to bring a letter of dischargis fra the king
til the aldirman and the balliez and the said robert law borch for
the said John' anent all' party

Item the said Dawy Dwn' has fwndyn' borowis for the
ilke cawss' in and in the samyn maner abeowyn wirtyn John'
Wod and Dawy of ruthirford' and law borowis that all partis
be skathless'

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene xxvjto
die mensis Julij Anno et cetera xlv Quo die secta
vocata et curia affirmata
fyndlaw fleshewar' in amerciment for brekyn of price
Item the said wnlaw findlaw is in a nothir wnlaw for outakyn of the neris

John ynlach inlach and al the laff ilkane of ane wnlaw
Item the said John' is in twa wnlawis' ane for the out takkyn of the nerris and in ane nothir for
the slaying' of fles' on sonday

William of lammyntown' oftsiss' callit to folw the borch that he
strekit on John' of crwdan' comperit nocht and was gifwyn that
the said John wes qwyt of his chalangis qwill he festenit with
new soit

the qwhilk day Will of Well' folowyt gilbert colly that he haldis fra hym wrangwysly
xvj s' and the said gilbert askyt lauchfull day and it wes assignit him to
comper to the nest lauchfull day

div.head: assisa
div.p:
Ricardus ruthirfurd' John' gray John' Woud' Dauit ruthirfurd andreas culane
robert prat John' blak John' patonson' Willelmus banerman andreas de tulydef
John' blyndsel John' sanchqwhar' John' wocat patricius badenach'

gib tod' callit the third' day tyll entir John' alanson' to the chalance of thom' of
cadiyow and nocht comperyt qwhar for it is chargit the seriandis to distres' the said' gib et cetera

The samyn day richart of Kyntor' and John' of Kynnor' Ilke ane in amerciament for the
wrang wys' borcht that thai strekyt on John' adamson for the wr entromettyn'
of a ton' of wadd' and the said' John' is made qwyt of thair chalance
be the assijs be for wryttyn

the samyn day alexander galt callyt
Alexander galt primo die vocatus ad sectam Symonis blabir' et non comparuit quare precipuiturprecipitur et cetera
henricus thomson primo die vocatus ad ad sectam Johannis henrison culan et non comparuit et cetera
Duncanus ruthwen' tercio die vocatus ad sectam Symonis blabir non comparuit quare precipuiturprecipitur et cetera

Dauid ruthirfurd Ricardus stephani' et ceteri consocij sui secundo die vocatus ad es sectam gilberti
menyhes non comparuerunt quare precipitur seriando quod capiat distres' et cetera
Thomas gilruth secundo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis buchan non comparuit quare precipitur seriando et cetera

The samyn day John' crukschank com in the tollbuth and complenyheit apon the aldirman
and the balyheis that thai wald' nocht yif out the determinacion of the s assis' of a
bref of richt and' the aldirman callyt the assijs that wes present and' thai
haf determyt that John' of lowdon wes na deforsar'

John' stewynson' has fundyn Edmund' banerman law borch that androw benying sall be wnscait
bot as the cours of comon' law will

Androw benying has fundyn robert prat law borch that John' stewynson sall be wnscathit
as the cours of comon' law will

the samyn day thom gibson com to clep and call apon John' banerman of the Watirton'
of iiij marcis and iij s' and' of ane wche the price ij marcis in faut of defens and
sal assith the saide thom as law will and the said' John' banerman Jugit in ane
wnlaw for the wrangwys'

the samyn day androw of tulydef John' gray John' Wocat the son' and alexander
of scroggis oft callyt nocht comperit to the chalance of thom blyndcell as
the ferd day for the haldyn of iiij spunys the said thomas is cumin to his
clap and' his call of the said spunys the pricis of iiij four' wnce in faut of
defens and the said personis' in a ane wnlaw and sall content the said' thomas
in term of law

the samyn day John' rogerson' and his wif callit and nocht comperit as l the frist day
to chalance of of John' cristison for the wrangwys' haldyn of xviij s'
qwhar for it wes chargyt the seriandis to distres' the said' John' as to the secund'
day

the samyn day Ingraham in
amerment amerciament for the wrangwys' haldyn of a barrell of salmond'
fra Wil fechat and' to restor the barrell to the said' Wil in term of law
In crasteno John baxstar Robertson' put hym in the balliez will and is iugit in ane wnlaw
William fwlar' put hym in the balliez wyll' and is iugit in ane wnlaw
William of Katness' put hym in the balliez wyll' and is iugit in ane wnlaw
William clubb put hym in the balliez will and is Jugit in ane wnlaw
John baxstar put hym in the balliez wyll' and is Jugit in ane wnlaw
Andrw lell' put hym in the balliez will and is iugit in ane wnlaw
the wiff of John' paterson' in amerciment

It is to remembir' that on the sewyn and twenty day of Julij
the yer' of our' lord jM iiijcccc and xlv yer' Andrw of cwlan'
burgess' of Abirdene geff certan' anuwall' til the kyrk of abirdene
Joh tyll ane awtar' to be mad in the north yill' of our'
lady of pyte' in the frist ane anuwall' of xx s' lyand in
the hede raw the qwilk William of retra has in' fee Alswa
in that ilke raw ane anuwell' of xij s' of that land that Andrw
henrisonz' ayris aw Alswa in the galwgat on the est sid of
the land of patrik lang x s' Alswa in that ilke gat and on that
ilk gat sid of the land that adam mor' dwelt in x s'
Alswa in that ilke gat and on the west side of that land
that thom' lyp has in fee vij s' and vj d' the qwilk for
such anuwall' the said Andrw of cwlan' wpgeff in the
handis of John' Kymdy than ane of the balliez of the said
burch of Abirdene in presens of John' the Wauss' than Aldirman
thom blindzell' John' of scrogis and Duncan' of clat
in that tym' alswa balliez and all' yer' forsad' anuwall'
ar' grund annuall' of the fornemnyt landis
Curia tenta vndecimo die mensis augusti
law hollie in amerciment for the wrangwiss' distrubelyn of Robert Wormot
Robert Wormot in amerciment
William of liddall' in amerciment for the distrubelyn of Andrw talyour
Androw talyour in amerciment for' his distrubelance

It is to remembir' that John' blac has mad John Kymdy his procuratour
and attournay til ask fra the lard of ochterless' allirdess' as be vj marc'
and v s' as borch and dettour for Will scott of lacheris to be payit to the
said John' blac be ach dayis eftyr' frist marymess' day witness'
John adamson' and William fichet the son' of Richard fichat the qwilk John
Adamson' and William fichat has in presens of the aldirman and the balliez sworn'
that war by herd and saw and forwytness' tan' qwen this connand wes mad

Edwart lytstar is oblisit that gif he findis nocht John ywll' iiij wln'
of clath betwen' this and yhoyll' that gif John ywll' and he his wiff swer
that thai ressauit nocht that clath fra the said edwardis wiff he sall'
content and pay to the said John yhwlle the fornemnit clath or the walw

Vicesimotercio die mensis Augustj Anno supradicto / Robertus Wormot ad instanciam
clementis say et pro eo deuenit plegius et debitor si Andreas broisour' post aduentum
suum velit Jurare quod dictus Clemens promisit Johanni nicholson' duo dimidia
alias pro feodo suo / ipse Robertus satisfaciet eidem Johanni vnum dimidium auri

Item eodem die Andreas de tulidef traxit terram suam in plegium preposito / quod idem prepositus
et balliui erunt indempnes pro actione mota inter Alexandrum Ramsay de culluthi
et ipsum Andream penes xix lib' / super quibus quoddam actum parliamentj domini nostri Regis
eisdem preposito et balliuis fuerat presentatum

This is the deliuerancez of John' Kymedy Robert Wormot John' of Kintor and John' nicholson'
arbitrouris in causez movit betuex Will Kelt on that a part / and Duncane Kelt on
that othir parte In the firste the said Duncane sal give owre al clame of right'
the quhilke he had or has to the cabil the quhilk is in plede betuene thaim
And he sal bring has schawin and deliuerit to the forsaid Will Kelt lettres and Seelez of ser henry Douglas and ser Jamez stewart
knyghtis' of certificacion / that naman has reson' to that cable bot he /
And the forsaid Will Kelt sal give to the said Duncane xx s' of monay

Item eodem die comparens personaliter Dauid meignes optulit se paratum satisfacere thome
stane de duabus partibus vnius sarpellarii lane quas alias idem thomas optinuit super
dictum Dauid / et hoc secundum quod continetur supra in actis curie desuper confect' et ad
visum proborum virorum huius consilij huius burgi

Item alexander grahame procurator et procuratorio nomine alexandri Ramsay domini de culluthi asseruit quod
alias elapsis xl diebus et vltra ipse alexander nomine quo supra presentauit preposito et
ballivis huius burgi litteras patentes su domini nostri Regis sig sub testimonio sigilli sui / de
precept' directas eisdem preposito et balliuis ad compellendum Andream de tulidef
ad satisfaciendum prefato alexandro Ramsay / xix lib' / quas adiudicatus fuit
soluere eidem in parliamento domini nostri Regis prout in dictis litteris continebatur / et licet
dictam solucionem diuersis vicibus ad eisdem balliuis fuerat interpellatus adhuc tamen illam
minime poterat optinere // Et super hoc pecijt instrumentum a me notorio publico / testibus
Johanne gray Roberto Wormot et Johanne Voket cum multis alijs et cetera

Johannes de spens seriendus confessus est quod ipse cepit alias pro quodam amerciamento debit' per Johannes cassy
ipse cepit vnam ollam eream / quod amerciamentum taxatum fuit ad iiij s' / quos eciam recepit
ad eodem Johannes cassy licet nondum deliberauit sibi suam ollam .

This is the deliuerance of thomas blyndseil John' of Scrogs thomas Kintor and
Dauid symson' arbitrouris chosin apon the debatis movit betuex William
burnet on that a part and Robert Williameson' on that othir part /
In the first the said Robert sal give and deliuer to the forsaid William
a sufficient hamburgh' barell' of salmond' / Item viij fresch' salmond'
Item for salt vj s' / Item anence the v s' for broune clath' / give that
Robert may prove the payment it sal stand paijt / and give he may noght'
the forsaid Will sal acquite him / and Robert sal pay it
Item the forsaid Williame is awand to the said Robert for beer' v s
Item for salmond' v s' / Item for hamburgh' beir' xviij d' / Item anence
the clok and the hos' / the said Robert sal acquite / him that nothir he gave
thaim na sald thaim to him / and that done he sal pay at the sight' of nyghboris'
eftir as thai war worth' / Item he sal give to the said Robert als gude
a feltin hat as he lent him of ellis the price of it

Item anence the debate betuex Clement Say of the Sluys' maistir of the
barge on that a part / and nichole Ayncroft steir'man of the barge on that
othir part / it n anence the twa petty quartirez and sex meetis of salt the
quhilk the said nichol has Ressavit and a clamys for his furyng / the
quhilk furing the forsaid clement denyis and saijs he aw him noght'
be express' condicion made at his feyng / It is appoyntit and accordit
betuex the said partiez / that give Sandris of scrogs and James of balrony
the quhilk warr' present the tyme of the feyng of the said nichol / will
swer' befor the law that it was expremit that he suld haue na furyng
the said nichol sal pay for the said salt like as it was sald in this ton'
for the quhilk he has drawin borgh' xxiiij s' g' the quhilk remanys
of his fee in the said clementis hand / And give it was noght' expremit
be thair' athes / he sal haue sic furyng as the law makis him thare
And give the sammyn men saijs that the said nichol suld be free heir'
the said clement sal give him for his fee owre j li' g'
